Alarm (Seer1 Abju): R50' Entry into 20' radius triggers audible or mental alarm for 20 hr
Augury (Seer2 Divi): Self has 80% chance to learn weal or woe outcome of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future

Divination (Seer4 Divi): Self has 80% chance to learn useful advice on a proposed action up to 1 week in the future
